org.kroz.activerecord.utils
Class Logg

java.lang.Object
  org.kroz.activerecord.utils.Logg

public class Logg
extends java.lang.Object

Extended android logger with 'printf'-style logging and controlled indentation. Use it similar to standard Android Log class. To start or stop indentations of log messages call method indents().

Log messages priorities

  • VERBOSE 2 (0x00000002)
  • DEBUG 3 (0x00000003)
  • INFO 4 (0x00000004)
  • WARN 5 (0x00000005)
  • ERROR 6 (0x00000006)
  • ASSERT 7 (0x00000007)

Author:
Vladimir Kroz

Field Detail

enabled

public static boolean enabled
Switch which allows to turn logger on and off. When set to false - logger is disabled for all subsequent calls until this attributes is set to true again

useIdents

public static boolean useIdents

indents

public static void indents(boolean flag)
Deprecated. new recommended approach - set/unset attribute useIdents directly.

Parameters:
flag - true to start indentation, false - to stop it
